welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Dracut, a charming town known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer during your stay. Enjoy your time here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes amenities such as restaurants, shops, and baggage claim.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private jet operations and offers exclusive services for private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'HanscomFieldWiFi' from their device's list of available networks.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A hub for American Airlines and JetBlue, with a variety of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A terminal primarily used by Delta Air Lines and its partners, with a Sky Club lounge and many dining options.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: The international terminal, with duty-free shopping and a variety of dining options.

wifi.note: Connect to the network and follow the prompts to access free WiFi throughout the airport.
